doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 46 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/12/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 46 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/12/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. San Diego man secures life insurance coverage after being denied due to homosexuality2. Philadelphia school board hears council about teaching nondiscrimination for gay students3. Alexandria, Virginia city council postpones voting on a gay rights measure indefinitelyCOMMERCIAL: Stamp Out AIDS featuring Jennifer Bassey4. Vermont man "cured" of being homosexual carries a 50 lb. cross across the state5. Andy Humm on the state of politics with a Democrat-controlled SenateCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp6. London, Education Secretary upset with educational book about a child with homosexual parents, calling it "homosexual propaganda"7. Study shows being bitten or scratched by AIDS patient carries little chance of spreading the virus8. Early testing shows three new AIDS drugs block spread of virus without side effects of AZT9. Circumcision rate for US males sharply declinesCOMMERCIAL: GCN pledge drive, with clips from the year's news9. Sports Report, interview with Tom Hansen, commissioner of MCAA BowlingCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine10. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Interview with the director of "The Decline of the American Empire," Denys ArcandCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. "Just Ask Raz" advice segmentCOMMERCIAL: The Monster3. Coverage of the Christopher Street Halloween ParadeCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation with Jose Sarria4. Interview with calendar model, Andre Fiset5. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 46 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/12/1986]: November 1986
